name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker wrongly convicted of murder finds hope and friendship in prison. A tale of perseverance and redemption.

name: The Godfather
description: A powerful mafia family’s patriarch transfers control to his reluctant son. A saga of power, loyalty, and betrayal.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the chaotic Joker in a battle for Gotham’s soul. A gripping mix of action and psychological depth.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Interconnected crime stories unfold with dark humor and violence. A cult classic with unforgettable dialogues.

name: Inception
description: A thief enters dreams to plant ideas, but reality blurs. A mind-bending sci-fi thriller by Christopher Nolan.

name: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to work for a wealthy household. A darkly comic masterpiece on class divide.

name: Spirited Away
description: A girl trapped in a spirit world works to free her parents. Hayao Miyazaki’s magical animated adventure.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac and a soap salesman start an underground fight club. A twisted critique of modern masculinity.

name: Interstellar
description: Astronauts search for a new home as Earth dies. A visually stunning epic about love and time dilation.

name: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation. Groundbreaking action with cyberpunk philosophy.
